title: Create tag
communityTip: Community where tag will be created
name: Name
nameTip: Unique name of the new tag
descriptionFieldTip: Instructions on how to use tag
tagIsKeyword: A tag is used as a keyword or a label to categorize your post.
usingTheRightTags: Using the right tags makes it easier for other users to find your posts.
suggestTagWhichWillbeUseful: Suggest a tag, which will be useful to you and 100 other users who will vote for it.
creatorCannotUpvoteOwnComm: Creators cannot upvote their own tag
